title: 의견 강조 어휘
description: strongly, firmly, unequivocally 등의 부사와 형용사를 사용하여 의견을 강조합니다. OPINION-EMPHASIS-VOCABULARY 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: We firmly believe in equal rights.
I am unequivocally against any form of discrimination.
learning_points: 강한 어휘를 통한 의견의 무게 조절과 설득력 강화

sentences.en: We firmly believe in equal rights.

sentences.kr: 저는 모든 형태의 차별에 단호히 반대합니다.
sentences.en: I am unequivocally against any form of discrimination.
I wholeheartedly believe in the success of this project.
We strongly advocate for the importance of transparency.
We firmly agree with this policy change.
I absolutely endorse the need for quality control.
I categorically believe this decision is correct.
